Package Game.sprite

Class SpriteAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.sprite.SpriteAnimation
  • public class SpriteAnimation
extends java.lang.Object
    this class allows to configure the enemy animation.
    Since:
    March 2019

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpriteAnimation

        public SpriteAnimation​(double xPos,
                       double yPos,
                       int rows,
                       int columns,
                       int animationSpeed,
                       java.lang.String imgPath)
        Creates invaders animation.
        Parameters:
        xPos - Specified X coordinate where the sprites are going to be created
        yPos - Specified Y coordinate where the sprites are going to be created
        rows - Sprite height
        columns - Sprite width
        animationSpeed - Sprite's animation speed.
        imgPath - Sprite image URL.

      • addSprite

        public void addSprite​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage spriteMap,
                      int xPos,
                      int yPos,
                      int width,
                      int height)
        Adds a new invader to the map.
        Parameters:
        spriteMap - image map.
        xPos - Specified X coordinate where the new invader is going to be added.
        yPos - Specified Y coordinate where the new invader is going to be added.
        width - new invader width.
        height - new invader height.

      • setPlay

        public void setPlay​(boolean play,
                    boolean destroyAfterAnim)
        Stops loop animation and sets as true destroyAfterAnim and play.
        Parameters:
        play - true if invader is destroyed.
        destroyAfterAnim - true if invader is destroyed.

      • getLimit

        public int getLimit()
        Returns invader's arm position.
        Returns:
        0 = closed arms.

        1 = extended arms.

        2 = invasor explotion.

      • setLimit

        public void setLimit​(int limit)
        Changes invader's arm position from close to open and vice versa
        Parameters:
        limit - Invader arm position.

        0 = closed arms.

        1 = extended arms.

        2 = invasor explotion.
